titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TUMOUR INVASION INDICATOR (CORPUS CAVERNOSUM) - Description

body.p: TUMOUR INVASION INDICATOR (CORPUS CAVERNOSUM) is the same as attribute TUMOUR INVASION INDICATOR FOR PENIS , to indicate if the Tumour has invaded the corpus cavernosum (one of two parallel columns of erectile TISSUE forming the dorsal part of the body of the penis) during an Urological Cancer Care Spell .
